result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Anthony Morgan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: *The court orders defendant to pay all applicable costs, fees, assessments and surcharges  as a condition of extended supervision as imposed in Case 15CF4794, counts 1,2,3(5,6,7) and failure to do so will result in entry of civil judgment.

Per order dated May 3, 2022, Appeal No 2017XX1005-CR, 
IT IS ORDERED that the circuit court's deadline for deciding Morgan's postconviction motion filed in case No. 2015CF4794, is extended through August 16, 2022. See WIS. STAT. RULE 809.82(2)(a) (2019-20).

Per Order dated February 8, 2022, Appeal No 2017XX1005-CR (2014CM3257, 2015CF4794, AND 2015CM705). 
IT IS ORDERED that the deadline for deciding the postconviction motion is extended until May 16, 2022.

Per Order Dated December 13, 2021, Appeal No. 2017XX1005-CR, (2014CM3257, 2015CF4794 and 2015CM705), 
IT IS ORDERED that the deadline for Morgan to file a postconviction motion or notice of appeal in this matter is extended to January 21, 2022.
Exhibits removed from inventory BOX 693 and provided to appeals-SS

Per order dated October 14, 2021, Appeal No. 2017XX1005-CR (2014CM3257, 2015CF4794 and 2015CM705),  IT IS ORDERED that this matter is held in abeyance pending further order of this court.
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that, no later than October 21, 2021, Attorney Donovan shall file a corrected motion in this matter. If Attorney Donovan does not file a corrected motion by the deadline stated, we will strike the improperly signed motion without action. See id

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
The court will be sentencing the counts as listed in the TRIAL INFORMATION:
Count 1: (count 1 in 14CM3257)
Count 2: (count 2 in 14CM3257) NOT GUILTY 
Count 3: (count 3 in 14CM3257)
Count 4: (15CM705)
Count 5: (count 1 in 15CF4794)
Count 6: (count 2 in 15CF4794)
Count 7: (count 3 in 15CF4794)
Count 8: (count 4 in 15CF4794)
Count 9: (count 5 in 15CF4794)

Sentencing proceeded.  State has complied with victim notification.  Presentence Investigation reviewed.  The defendant chose not to partipate in the PSI or to review it with his counsel.  Statements by state, defense and defendant.   Additional statements by Robert M., Sherelle H., Arlene C., Sandie R., Arielle R.  The defendant disrupted the statement of Robert M and was escorted out of the courtroom and the court took a brief recess.
Sentencing resumed.
The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 9 months in the House of Correction, consecutive to count 1 in 14CM3257.
The court orders defendant to pay all applicable costs, fees, assessments and surcharges  as a condition of extended supervision as imposed in Case 15CF4794, counts 1,2,3(5,6,7) and failure to do so will result in entry of civil judgment.
Defendant advised of appeal rights. CR-233 filed in 15CF4794.
Defendant remanded.
PSI received via email from Probation Department and emailed to counsels.

Exhibits received and inventoried this date.  
Box 693 and brown bag in plastic
cf
Exhibit List is filed and scanned into 15CF4794
Count 4 of JURY TRIAL Information

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner and Brittany Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Jury in the box at 8:55am.  Cross examination of Michael M. resumed.  Jury out of the box at 9:45am.  Jury in the box at 10:20am.  Sworn for the defense:  Gail H.; Det. Dennis DeValkenaere(MPD); Det. Kenyatte Wooden(MPD).  Defense rests.  Sworn for the state in rebuttal:  Det. James Hutchinson(MPD); Det. Erik Gulbrandson(MPD).  State rests. Testimony closed.   EXHIBITS RECEIVED 172-175.  Jury out of the box at 11:30am.
Motion to dismiss at close of evidence, if motion had been made, would be denied by the court.  Jury instruction conference placed on the record and instructions stipulated to by counsels.  Jury in box at 11:45am.  Court began to instruct jury and recessed for lunch directing all parties to appear by 1:10pm.  Jury out of the box at 12:05pm. 
All parties present in court at 1:10pm.  Jury in the box at 1:28pm.  Court resumed instructing jury.   Closing arguments by state and defense.  Rebuttal argument by the state.  Court charged the jury.  Alternate juror (#18) selected by lot and released.  Jury retired at the hour of 3:05pm to deliberate in the charge of Sheriff's Deputies Baker and Spottek who were duly sworn for that purpose.  Parties stipulate to exhibits that may be given to jury upon request.  Jury question received and addressed by the court.
At the hour of 4:48pm the jury was released for the evening and ordered to return at 9am on 9-16-2016 to resume deliberations.  Jury trial scheduled for September 16, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner and Brittany Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Jury in the box at 9:10am.  Cross examination of Kent Corbett resumes.  Sworn for the state:  Det. Joseph Sedlacek(MPD); Dr. Wieslawa Tlomak, Deputy Chief Medical Examiner Milwaukee County; Det. James Hutchinson(MPD); Jonathan Jenkins, Forensic Investigator(MPD); Matthew Maudlin, Latent Print Examiner(MPD); Lisa Treffinger, Forensic Scientist, DNA Analyst-WI State Crime Lab.  Jury out of the box at 10:30am.
Brief in chambers discussion held with parties.  On the record, all parties are prepared to go forward with the trial.  Jury in the box at 11:00am.  Sworn for the state:  Nicole Poser, Intelligence Analyst-phone records.  Court will recess for lunch until 1:05pm.  Jury out of the box at 11:58am.
All parties are present in court at 1:10pm.  Jury in the box at 1:43pm.  Sworn for the state:  Dennis W.  State rests subject to rebuttal.  Jury out of the box at 2:20pm.  The state will present a stipulation to the jury that the owner (Jason F.) of the house at 5647 N. 36th Street did not give consent to anyone to set house on fire and cause damage.  Defense motion for directed verdict at close of state's case denied by the court.  Jury in the box at 2:50pm.  Stipulation presented to jury.  State rests.  Sworn for defense: Lakeashah M.; Sherelle H.  Jury out of the box at 3:25pm.  Colloquy between the court and defendant as to his decision to testify in his own behalf.  Jury in the box at 3:40pm.  Sworn for the defense:  Sheila W.  Jury out of the box at 4:10pm.  Jury in the box at 4:20pm.   Sworn for the defense:  Michael M., Sr. Court recessed for the evening and directed all parties to return at 8:45am on 9-15-2016.
EXHIBITS RECEIVED:  120-125; 159-168
DEFENSE: 158

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner and Brittany Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Jury trial resumed.  Jury in the box at 9:05am.  Sworn for the state:  PO Joseph Carlson(MPD); PO Jeremy Carter(MPD); Lt. Daryl Wendlick(MFD); Sandie R.  Jury out of the box at 10:47am.  Jury in the box at 11:10am.  Sworn for the state:  Det. Brian Stott(MPD).  Jury out of the box at 11:55am.  Court recessed for lunch.  
All parties are present in court at 1:00pm.  Jury in the box at 1:10pm.  Cross examination of Det. Stott.  Sworn for the state:  Kerri Schott, Forensic Investigator(MPD); Sylvia Gerasch, Forensic Investigator(MPD); Det. Shelondia Tarver(MPD); Raymond Lenz, Forensic scientist-WI State Crime Lab; Special Agent Michael Reimer, WI DOC-Criminal Investigation.  Jury out of the box at 2:30pm.  Jury in the box at 2:55pm.  Sworn for the state:  James C. (represented by Atty Steven Sargent).  THE COURT ORDERS THAT UPON COMPLETION OF TESTIMONY BY THIS WITNESS HE IS TO BE RELEASED FROM ALL REQUIREMENTS  OF BAIL.  
Sworn for the state:  Det. Tiffany Skonieczny(MPD); Kent Corbett-Investigator DA's office. (Exhibit #156 played for the jury).  Court will recess for the day.  Jury out of the box at 4:46pm.  All parties to return at 8:50am on 9-14-2016.  Sidebars placed on the record.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Cases (14CM3257, 15CM705, 15CF4794) are proceeding to trial today.  The state has filed an AMENDED INFORMATION  for purposes of trial only.  As to Amended Information counts 1,2,3 pertain to case 14CM3257; count 4 pertains to 15CM705; counts 5,6,7,8,9 pertain to 15CF4794.
Jury panel in court.  Voir dire proceeded at the hour of  10:37am.  
Thirteen (13) good and lawful citizens of the County of Milwaukee, WI qualified to serve as jurors in the above entitled cause were duly impanelled.  Jury list received and filed.  Court excuses panel for lunch and directs them to return by 1:15pm.  Strikes for cause are placed on the record.
Cases recalled at 1:35pm.  Jury in the box and sworn.    Jury panel in court.  Court ordered witnesses sequestered.  Court instructed jury.  Opening statements by state and defense.  Trial proceeded.  Sworn for the state:  PO Derek Jeter(MPD); PO Tyler Pileggi(MPD); Areial R.  Jury out of the box at 4:00pm.  Jury in the box at 4:12pm.  Sworn for the state:  Nathaniel B.  Court admonishes jury not to conduct any independent investigation and releases panel for evening.  Jury out of the box at 4:30pm
State objects to large portion of defense counsel's opening statement.  Defense counsel is directed not to refer to no contact orders as restraining orders.  Defense counsel is directed to abide by sequestration order of witnesses.  Defense has not filed a Notice of Alibi, however, the state is not objecting at this time.
Court directs all parties to appear at 8:50am on 9-13-2016.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State unable to secure essentail witness and requests to adjourn trial.  Defense objects and moves to dismiss.  Court denies defense motion to dismiss and grants State's request for an adjournment.  Court orders case adjourned for jury trial to Branch 38.  Jurors released.  Jury trial scheduled for September 12, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Amended Information filed by the State. 

In-chambers discussions placed on the record.  Parties discussed pretrial Motions and issues; rulings placed on the record.  Case passed.  

Back on ther record, same appearances.  Off the record discussions placed on the record.   Statements by state regarding essential witness not appearing.  State requests a body attachment for witness.  Discussions as to how to proceed.  Defense makes an objection to any further adjournments.  Court orders case adjourned to 1:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Karl Hayes for Grant Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case calendared for jury trial today.  In-chambers discussion placed on the record.  Defense requests a one week adjournment.  Arguments heard, Court denies defense request to adjourn.  Parties discussed how the trial will proceed. 

Jury panel in court.  Voir dire proceeded at the hour of  10:39 am.  Thirteen (13) good and lawful citizens of the County of Milwaukee, WI qualified to serve as jurors in the above entitled cause were duly impanelled.  Jury list received and filed.  At the hour of 12:06 pm jury dismissed for the day, but ordered to return at 9:15 am on 9-07-2016.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Arguments heard as to admissability of videotape for jury trial in 15CF4794.  Jury trial remains on for 9-6-2016.

Judge is out ill today.  Attorney Christopher Scott Carson in court, defendant Michael Anthony Morgan not in court, in custody.  ADA Grant Ian Huebner is ill today.  Matter is set over to 8-23-2016 at 8:15 for FPT.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  There is a joint request for an adjourned final pretrial on 8-22-2016.
File held in courtroom  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 22, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Christopher Scott Carson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Carson has been privately retained.  Atty Bihler is moving to withdraw.  The state does not believe that it will be unduly prejudiced by change in counsel.  The court informs the defendant and Atty Carson that another change in counsel will not be allowed in these cases.  Evidentiary issues that need to be resolved concern the forensic intereviews of the children.  Atty Bihler gives discovery to Atty Carson.  The court will vacate the hearing date of 6-2-2016 and the trial date of 6-13-2016.  Matters will be adjourned to 8-4-2016 at 8:15 for FPT/motions and 9-6-2016 at 8:15 for FIRM Jury trial.  Parties are advised that Branch 38 will be in Room 423 Safety Building as of August 1, 2016.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 4, 2016 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 6, 2016 at 08:15 am.
filed by newly retained counsel, Christopher Carson.  Court orders matter be set for hearing on 5-27-2016 at 8:15 and that all parties be present.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
Court grants State's request to join all 3 cases. Case is joined with 14CM3257 and 15CF4794 for trial. State requested a decision date prior to trial regarding videos he is providing to the defense, State will file a brief by May 20, 2016. Court calendared the case for 6/2/2016 at 9:00 a.m. for Motion Hearing. Trial date remains on 6/13/2016 at 8:15 a.m.  Motion hearing scheduled for June 2, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Antoni Apollo on behalf of Grant Ian Huebner, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
Case set for Motion Hearing. Defendant request new attorney. Court held colloquy with the defendant. Defendant request to hire private counsel. Curt advises the defendant that his new attorney must appear at the next hearing or his current attorney will continue to represent him. Case calendared for Final Pretrial on 5/6/2016 at 8:15 a.m. in Branch 38.
Held off the record. Defense request a Motion Hearing date regarding a Motion to withdraw as counsel. Case calendared for 5/2/2016 at 8:15 a.m. in Branch 38.

Attorney Douglas Michael Bihler in court, defendant Michael Anthony Morgan not in court, in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Case is adjourned for a Motion hearing in br. 38 to address the Joinder motion and hear arguments as to the forensic videos.  State to provide forensic videos prior to the next court date.  Defendant made in custody statements of denial and had given an alibi, which was disproved.  Defense is currently investigating.  Motion hearing scheduled for April 29, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Scanned:  State Subpoena.

Attorney Douglas Michael Bihler in court, defendant Michael Anthony Morgan not in court, in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State is moving to join all cases, 15CF4794, 14CM3257 and 15CM705.  The court will set a date for arraignment(15CF4794), motion for joinder and hearing as to custodial statement on 3-24-2016 at 1:00pm.  The state will also be filing a Forfeiture by Wrongdoing motion.   Cases set for final pretrial on 5-6-2016 at 8:15am.  Jury trial set for 6-13-20167 at 8:15am.  All final pretrial documents to be filed by the final pretrial hearing.  All motions to be filed by 3-7-2016.  Motion hearing scheduled for March 24, 2016 at 01:00 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 6, 2016 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 13, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Thomas John Erickson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Thomas John Erickson informs court that there has been a breakdown in communication that is irreconcilable.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney is to inform the Public Defender's Office that new counsel needs to be appointed.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to 2/5/2016 at 8:15 a.m. in Branch 38. Status conference scheduled for February 5, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Defendant's Response to State's Motion for Joinder

Attorney Thomas John Erickson in court, defendant Michael Anthony Morgan not in court, in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  IN CHAMBERS DISCUSSION HELD.
Court will adjourn matter to 1-28-2016 at 8:15 for defendant to be present for pretrial and status of counsel.  Case 15CF4794 is also to be heard on that date.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Defendant Michael Anthony Morgan in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In chambers discussion held.
Back on record.  Defendant is retaining private counsel in these cases and in homicide case 15CF4794 currently set for trial in Branch 7 on 3-28-2016.  The court will allow Atty Rebholz to wtihdraw and set a date for new counsel to appear. Case set for status on 1-20-2016.  Status conference scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 08:15 am.
